content.Name: content
Values:
Automated test related to this page covers the following set of test cases for Context Expression:

C5886804 - Context Expression installation Web App [Web8]
C5971594 - Conditional CP - Include TG - True
C5971595 - Conditional CP - Include TG - False
C5971596 - Conditional CP - Include multiple TGs - True
C5971597 - Conditional CP - Include multiple TGs - True-False
C5971599 - Conditional CP - Exclude TG - True
C5971600 - Conditional CP - Exclude TG - False
C5971604 - Conditional CP - Include|Exclude TGs - True/True
C5971605 - Conditional CP - Include|Exclude TGs - True/False

note: this test is executed with the user agent corresponding to Apple iPhone 5 device
Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/601.1.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/9.0 Mobile/13B143 Safari/601.1
